cells.title: Title with a Title
cells.description: Read a book in which the novel title contains a job title, military title, or title of nobility such as locksmith, lieutenant, or lord. HARD MODE: Not a title of royalty.

cells.title: Superheroes
cells.description: Story focuses on super powered individuals. HARD MODE: Not related to DC or Marvel.

cells.title: Bottom of the TBR
cells.description: Read one of the books that’s been on your To Be Read pile the longest. HARD MODE: None.

cells.title: Magical Realism or Literary Fantasy
cells.description: Read a book that portrays magical or unreal elements in an otherwise realistic environment. HARD MODE: Not one of the thirty books in the linked thread.

cells.title: Young Adult
cells.description: Read a book that was written for young adults. HARD MODE: Published in the last 5 years.

cells.title: Mundane Jobs
cells.description: The protagonist has a commonplace job. HARD MODE: Does not take place on Earth.

cells.title: Published in the 00s
cells.description: Read a book that was published between 2000 and 2009. HARD MODE: Not in the top 30 of r/Fantasy’s Best of 2023 List.

cells.title: Angels and Demons
cells.description: Story must feature angels or demons in a prominent role. HARD MODE: The protagonist is an angel or demon.

cells.title: Five SFF Short Stories
cells.description: Any short SFF story as long as there are five of them. HARD MODE: Read an entire SFF anthology or collection.

cells.title: Horror
cells.description: Read a book from the horror genre. HARD MODE: Not Stephen King or H. P. Lovecraft.

cells.title: Self-Published OR Indie Publisher
cells.description: Self-published or published through a small, indie publisher. HARD MODE: Self-published and has fewer than 100 ratings on Goodreads.

cells.title: Set in the Middle East/Middle Eastern SFF
cells.description: Read a book set in the Middle East or based on Middle Eastern settings. HARD MODE: Author is of Middle Eastern heritage.

cells.title: Published in 2023
cells.description: A book published for the first time in 2023. HARD MODE: It's also a debut novel.

cells.title: Multiverse and Alternate Realities
cells.description: Read a book in which the setting contains at least two universes. HARD MODE: Characters do not walk through a literal door.

cells.title: POC Author
cells.description: Author must be Person of Color. HARD MODE: Novel takes place in a futuristic, sci-fi world.

cells.title: Book Club OR Readalong Book
cells.description: Any past or active r/Fantasy book clubs count. HARD MODE: Must read a current selection and participate in the discussion.

cells.title: Novella
cells.description: Read a work of fiction of between 17,500 and 40,000 words. HARD MODE: Not published by Tordotcom Publishing.

cells.title: Mythical Beasts
cells.description: Read a book that prominently features a mythical beast. HARD MODE: No dragons or dragon-like creatures.

cells.title: Elemental Magic
cells.description: Read a book that has elemental magic. HARD MODE: Not V. E. Schwab’s or Jim Butcher’s series.

cells.title: Myths and Retellings
cells.description: Read a book based on a myth or preexisting story. HARD MODE: Not Greek or Roman mythology.

cells.title: Queernorm Setting
cells.description: A book set in a world where queerness is normalized. HARD MODE: Not a futuristic setting.

cells.title: Coastal or Island Setting
cells.description: Story features a major setting near or surrounded by the sea. HARD MODE: The book also features sea-faring.

cells.title: Druids
cells.description: A book that heavily features druids. HARD MODE: Not The Iron Druid Chronicles.

cells.title: Featuring Robots
cells.description: Read a book that features robots, androids, or automatons. HARD MODE: Robot is the protagonist.

cells.title: Sequel
cells.description: Read a book that is a sequel to another SFF book. HARD MODE: Book 3 or on in the series.
